item.title: Checking Nulls and Null-Aware Operators in Dart
item.description: What is the best practice for checking nulls in Dart? var value = maybeSomeNumber(); if (value != null) { doSomething(); } That’s right. There is no shortcut like if (value) and truthy/falsey values in Javascript. Conditionals in Dart only accept bool values. However! There are some very interesting null-aware operators.
